ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ARRCAT - CME arrival times and speeds with heliospheric imagers
ResourceHeader.Description: In this ARRival CATalog (ARRCAT), the arrivals of solar coronal mass ejections (CMEs) that were tracked by the STEREO heliospheric imagers are calculated. ARRCAT lists modeled arrivals of CMEs at various spacecraft and planets, based on the HIGeoCAT catalog of CMEs established at RAL Space, UK (R. A. Harrison, J. A. Davies, D. Barnes). It is a living catalog, updated about every 2 months.

Parameter.Name: id
Parameter.Description: id: From HIGeoCAT, the unique identifier for the observed CME.

Parameter.Name: sc
Parameter.Description: sc: From HIGeoCAT, the HI observing STEREO spacecraft, (A=Ahead or B=Behind)

Parameter.Name: target_name
Parameter.Description: target_name: Name of in situ target.

Parameter.Name: sse_launch_time
Parameter.Description: sse_launch_time: From HIGeoCAT, launch time of the CME at Sun center, unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: target_arrival_time
Parameter.Description: target_arrival_time: CME arrival time at target location calculated with the SSEF30 model, corrected for SSE shape (Möstl and Davies, 2013). unit: UTC.

Parameter.Name: target_arrival_time_err
Parameter.Description: target_arrival_time_err: Error of CME arrival time at target location from SSEF30 model, solely based on error in parameter sse_speed_err. unit: hours.

Parameter.Name: target_distance
Parameter.Description: target_distance: Target distance from Sun, at model CME arrival time. unit: AU.

Parameter.Name: target_heeq_lon
Parameter.Description: target_heeq_lon: Target longitude in HEEQ, at model CME arrival time. unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: target_heeq_lat
Parameter.Description: target_heeq_lat: Target latitude in HEEQ, at model CME arrival time. unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: target_delta
Parameter.Description: target_delta: Difference in HEEQ longitude between central CME direction and target location at model CME arrival time, positive values: spacecraft is west of CME apex. unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: sse_heeq_lon
Parameter.Description: sse_heeq_lon: From HIGeoCAT, the HEEQ longitude of the CME apex propagation direction, unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: sse_heeq_lat
Parameter.Description: sse_heeq_lat: From HIGeoCAT, the HEEQ latitude of the CME apex propagation direction, unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: sse_speed
Parameter.Description: sse_speed: From HIGeoCAT, speed of the CME apex, unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: sse_speed_err
Parameter.Description: sse_speed_err: From HIGeoCAT, error in the speed of the CME apex, unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: target_speed
Parameter.Description: target_speed: CME arrival speed from SSEF30 at target location, corrected for SSE shape (Möstl and Davies, 2013). unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: target_speed_err
Parameter.Description: target_speed_err: Error in CME arrival speed from SSEF30 at target location, corrected for SSE shape (Möstl and Davies, 2013). unit: km/s.

Parameter.Name: pa_fit
Parameter.Description: pa_fit: From HIGeoCAT, PA along which time-elongation profile is extracted, unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: pa_n
Parameter.Description: pa_n: From HIGeoCAT, northern position angle of CME, unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: pa_s
Parameter.Description: pa_s: From HIGeoCAT, southernmost position angle of CME, unit: degree.

Parameter.Name: pa_center
Parameter.Description: pa_center: average of pa_n and pa_s, unit: degree.
